title: Software Engineering Internship
skills: C#, WPF, JSON Serialization, Agile Practices, Version Control, Team Collaboration
overview: This is what introduced me to Software Development. I worked with a team of software engineers where I was assigned a project by myself, where I would meet with my mentor and supervisor weekly, and with the team on daily standups. My project was to develop a desktop application for one of their testing softwares.
impact: I surpassed expectations by developing a prototype within the first few weeks, and kept developing features for the project until my internship ended. I also got to demo the application to the product manager as well as the team. I followed Agile practices and Version control throughout my internship.
